ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Epic quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Creediki is 56th and gets 118 MR so you must be right on that. Have you gotten one of those nifty Lyran s Lutes yet? I love that thing, not sure how often I ll
ygData.messageBody:
Creediki is 56th and gets 118 MR so you must be right on that. Have you
gotten one of those nifty Lyran's Lutes yet? I love that thing, not sure how
often I'll use it though once I get my SSS. Also RE: Phara Dar - Grey Suede
Boots and Robe of Azure Sky finally dropped (last week), I'm sure you've
either seen them drop or saw the pics on FoH's website. The robe itself
makes me drool and I HATE playing caster classes.

Sartori{Legion}
57th Troubador, Veeshan

>maybe it's not exactly 75%, or there is some rounding going on, but it is
>between 75-80%, and does change as you level. at 57 i get 120 MR from
>psalm
>of mystic shielding with SSS, 67 without, which is a 79% increase. Thott
>at
>60 gets 126 MR with SSS.
>
>p.s. cleared VP again last night, killed Phara Dar for the second time.
>and
>though VI said they were not upgrading items or putting new loot in they
>obviously changed their mind cause there is some incredible stuff in there
>now, the caliber of items that should have always been in there and that we
>expected.
>
>Shada
>
>
> > Drool, I just heard this today as well. MR with Psalm of
> > Mystic Shielding up
> > by 118 pts while wielding SSS...
